text: Az ahli kitoʙ kase hast, ki agar moli farovone ʙa ū amonat dihī, onro ʙa tu ʙozmegardonad; va az [mijoni] onon kase hast, ki agar ūro ʙar dinore amin ʙişumorī, onro ʙa tu ʙoznamegardonad; magar on ki pajvasta ʙar [darjofti] on istodagī kunī. In ʙad-on xotir ast, ki onon megūjand: "Dar mavridi [xūrdani amvoli] qavmi araʙ, gunohe ʙar mo nest"; va [ʙad-in guna onon] dar hole ki [haqiqatro] medonand, ʙar Alloh taolo durūƣ meʙandand
